pr_title: Delete code for obsolete Harmony support

timeline.message:
Delete code for obsolete Harmony support

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why should we keep this line?
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: I'm following the pattern of the previous categories removed.
replies.author: pshipton

timeline.message:
Remove remainder of j9vmi library

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

Remove the OPT_HARMONY build flag

Also OPT_PASS which is unused and depends on OPT_HARMONY
